snippet: Mr. Fields, who has been playing the piano since the 1920s, is still working six nights a week and shows no signs of slowing down.
abstract: Mr. Fields, who has been playing the piano since the 1920s, is still working six nights a week and shows no signs of slowing down.

headline.main: His Best Friend at His Fingertips, a Pianist, 96, Plays On
headline.print_headline: His Best Friend at His Fingertips, a Pianist, 96, Plays On
